title: Djimalaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Specialty is baked-in-house daily hummus and pita. Has many clearly labeled vegan items. Some menu items are hand-cut fries, fresh salad, wraps, falafel and more. Has a juice bar and an alcohol bar also.
